body:
Please add a trailing underscore to the name, see this section for details
https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Variable_Names

Please also add a 'const' modifier, as this member is not supposed to be changed in the lifetime of the object.

Also applies to other places where you're adding the new member.

body_text:
Please add a trailing underscore to the name, see this section for details
https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Variable_Names
Please also add a 'const' modifier, as this member is not supposed to be changed in the lifetime of the object.
Also applies to other places where you're adding the new member.
